clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.

clauses.title: This service will warn users about website maintenance
clauses.description: Users will be notified before their experience is impacted due to website maintenance.

clauses.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
clauses.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.
